mods.abstract: The subject is an abstracted composition of crossing lines which, related the artist, was inspired by a spider's web.
mods.note: The print is made of three colors: an egg yellow, gray and chartreuse. Ms. Durieux related that the colors are not hard to distinguish for French printers who were always so anxious that the number of runs made are easily discernable.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
